summary: This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Paul S. Barrett, indicating a critical risk priority associated with his political exposure. It details his relationship with his father, Thomas J. Barrett, and includes various source references related to his financial and political status.

persons.name: Paul S Barrett
persons.context: Paul S. Barrett is flagged in a Deutsche Bank alert for having a critical risk priority due to his political exposure.

persons.name: Thomas J Barrett
persons.context: Thomas J. Barrett is mentioned as the father of Paul S. Barrett, who served as Vice Commandant of the Coast Guard.

connections.description: Paul S. Barrett is identified as the son of Thomas J. Barrett.

keyFacts: Paul S. Barrett is flagged in a Deutsche Bank alert with a critical risk priority.
He is associated with political exposure as indicated by the PEP (Politically Exposed Person) designation.
Thomas J. Barrett is noted as a former Vice Commandant of the Coast Guard.
The document references multiple sources related to Paul Barrett's financial and political status.
There are alerts dated 10/15/2018 regarding Paul Barrett's monitoring.
